snippet: Brandon Nimmo, a minor league outfielder who was the Mets’ top selection in the amateur draft last year, spent Tuesday in the team’s big-league camp
abstract: New York Mets minor league outfielder Brandon Nimmo, team's top selection in amateur draft last year, plays in his first major league exhibition game.
lead_paragraph: Brandon Nimmo, a minor league outfielder who was the Mets’ top selection in the amateur draft last year, spent Tuesday in the team’s big-league camp

headline.seo: Brandon Nimmo Gets a Look at the Major Leaguers
headline.main: With Eyes Open Wide, Teenager Gets a Look at the Major Leaguers
headline.print_headline: With Eyes Open Wide, Teenager Gets a Look At the Major Leaguers
